name: Biryani Bonanza
description: Biryani across regions—Malabar, Thalassery, Hyderabadi, Kolkata, Lucknowi.
fun: Blind aroma test: guess the spice mix.

name: Seafood Fiesta
description: Fish, prawns, crab, mussels. Coastal classics and experiments.
keralaTouch: Meen pollichathu, chemmeen roast, karimeen fry.
fun: Fish auction game with fake rupees.

name: Breakfast For Dinner
description: Appam, puttu, dosa, idiyappam at night. Sweet and savory.
fun: Dosa flip contest (safely!), or appam art challenge.

name: BBQ & Backyard Grill
description: Smoky grills, kebabs, paneer tikka, grilled pineapple.
fun: Sauce taste-off: who blends the best chutney?

name: Onam Sadhya
description: Traditional grand vegetarian feast on banana leaves.

name: Street Food Night
description: Chaat, kathi rolls, momos, shawarma, porotta.

name: Spice Route
description: Dishes highlighting one star spice per person.

name: Tiffin Tales
fun: Childhood food story circle (short, 1 minute each).

name: Vegetarian Delight
description: All-veg creativity—regional classics and modern twists.

name: Sweet Symphony
description: Desserts night—payasam, halwa, puddings, ice cream.
